name: Hushed Recur
description:
Hushed Recur

Controls: Up, Down, Left, Right.
Space: Activate / Pick Up.

Story:
You wake up in a facility of some kind, it appears abandoned, the power is off and the doors are locked due to a security lock-down. Make your way down the hall to the mainframe to restart the system and bring the facility online. You may have to solve the security puzzles set up by the facility staff to keep intruders out.
